trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer hvordan et dokument skrives ut når du skriver ut fra en Windows Forms-program.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, PrintController controls how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, PrintController styrer hvordan en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>skrives.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName> invokes the print controller's <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> methods, which in turn tell the printer how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Aktiverer trykt kontrolleren <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoder, som i sin tur be skriveren Skriv ut dokumentet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Print preview uses a specialized PrintController.
trans-unit.target: Forhåndsvisning bruker spesialiserte PrintController.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a print controller that is specialized for print preview, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> et eksempel på en domenekontroller for utskrift som er spesielle for forhåndsvisning

trans-unit.source: PrintController is used by <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, and not typically used directly.
trans-unit.target: PrintController brukes av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, og ikke brukes direkte.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes three print controllers that are derived from PrintController that help accomplish common tasks.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework inneholder tre trykt domenekontrollere som er avledet fra PrintController som bidrar til å utføre vanlige oppgaver.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> prints a document to a printer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>skriver ut et dokument til en skriver.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> generates a preview of what the document will look like when printed and is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>genererer en forhåndsvisning av dokumentet skal se ut når ut og brukes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>klasser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> provides a printing status dialog during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>gir en utskrift status-dialogboksen under utskriften.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om utskrift med Windows Forms den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Oversikt over navneområde.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ønsker å skrive ut fra en Windows presentasjon Foundation-programmet, kan du se den <xref:System.Printing>navneområde.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> brukes for forhåndsvisning.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, fullfører kontrollen sekvensen som bestemmer når og hvordan du skriver ut en side med et dokument.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage kalles like etter den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det et unntak i en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>hendelse for en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage ikke kalles.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>oppretter den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som er sendt til skriveren.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Etter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>kalles, den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metoden angir den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>til et bilde av én side.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Bruk av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metode for å angi hvordan du skriver ut en side i et dokument.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: For example, kan du justere sideinnstillinger separat for hver side.) Fjerner OnEndPage-metoden i <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mens den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metoden opphever tildeling objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerer dokumentet som skrives.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, fullfører kontrollen sekvensen som bestemmer når og hvordan du skriver ut et dokument.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPrint kalles like etter den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>oppretter den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som er sendt til skriveren.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Etter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>kalles, den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metoden angir den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>til et bilde av én side.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Bruk av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>metoden for å bestemme når og hvordan du skriver ut et dokument.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan forsinke utskrift på 30 minutter eller justere skriverinnstillingene for dokumentet.) Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoden tømmer den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>under metoden OnEndPrint opphever tildeling objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerer dokumentet som skrives.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, begynner du kontrollen sekvensen som bestemmer når og hvordan du skriver ut en side med et dokument.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage kalles like før den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>oppretter den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som er sendt til skriveren.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Etter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>kalles OnStartPage-metoden angir den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>til et bilde av én side.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoden tømmer den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mens den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metoden opphever tildeling objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPage method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Bruk OnStartPage-metoden til å angi hvordan du skriver ut en side i et dokument.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel justere sideinnstillinger separat for hver side.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerer dokumentet som skrives.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> som representerer en side fra en <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, begynner du kontrollen sekvensen som bestemmer når og hvordan du skriver ut et dokument.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint kalles like etter den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPrint method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Bruke OnStartPrint-metoden til å bestemme når og hvordan du skriver ut et dokument.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel forsinkelse utskrift på 30 minutter, eller justere skriverinnstillingene for dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint oppretter den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som er sendt til skriveren.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to one of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Når OnStartPrint kalles, den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metoden angir den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>til en av én side.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoden tømmer den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mens den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metoden opphever tildeling objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPrint method is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnStartPrint være lurt å kontrollere at <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>er gyldige.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerer dokumentet som skrives.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.
